long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Galaga Classic Game is an iconic and addictive arcade shooter available as a Chrome extension. Take control of a spaceship and engage in an intense battle against waves of alien invaders. Dodge enemy fire, shoot down enemy ships, and rescue your captured allies for extra firepower. With its retro graphics, nostalgic sound effects, and fast-paced gameplay, Galaga Classic Game delivers an authentic arcade experience. Earn high scores, unlock power-ups, and face off against challenging boss battles. Whether you're a fan of classic arcade games or new to the genre, Galaga Classic Game offers hours of thrilling and nostalgic entertainment. Get ready to defend the galaxy in this exciting Chrome extension game.

*Note:We have added "Unblocked Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://monkeymart.org/
